import React from 'react' import NavBar from '../../Components/Navbar/NavBar' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import { fetchOrder } from '../../Features/Order' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' function Order() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const {id} = useParams() useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchOrder()) }, [dispatch]) const { OrderInfo } = useSelector(state => state.order) //find order info by id const findOrder = (id) => { return OrderInfo.find(order => order._id === id) } //get params from url const order=OrderInfo.find(x=>x._id===id) return (
{ cartInfo ?

{item.name} inStock ₹{item.price} kg total:{item.total}
{item.quantity}kg

) }) }

delivery price Free

) } export default Order
